settings.title: WIN THE ULTIMATE MANHATTAN EXPERIENCE IN MELBOURNE
settings.content:
Rye July is a month-long celebration shining a light on whiskey made from rye, the unsung hero of the whiskey world.

To celebrate, we are giving you the chance to win 1 of 7 'Manhattan Experience in Melbourne' prizes for you and a friend!

Prize includes return flights to Melbourne from any major Australian city, 2 nights accomodation, welcome drinks with The Gospel crew, dinner voucher, tickets to a 'Broadway' show, tickets to a comedy show, The Gospel Manhattan Kit for you and your friend to take home, plus an itinerary to help you make the most of your 'Manhattan Experience' weekend. Total prize pool valued at over $16k!

settings.title: how to enter
settings.content:
To enter in the competition, simply follow the steps below.

-- Purchase a Manhattan cocktail from a participating venue
-- Ask the staff for an itemised receipt
-- Fill out the entry form at the end of this page

Winner drawn on August 7, 2023 and will be notified by The Gospel via email.
T&Cs apply.

settings.title: participating venues
settings.content:
This Rye July, The Gospel have partnered with over 50 venues across Australia to celebrate The Manhattan Experience.

See the list of participating venues here.

settings.section_main_title: WIN THE ULTIMATE MANHATTAN EXPERIENCE IN MELBOURNE
settings.section_content:
As Australia's only dedicated rye whiskey distillery, The Gospel is honoured to present Rye July, a month-long celebration shining a light on whiskey made from rye, the unsung hero of the whiskey world.

To celebrate Rye July, we are giving you the chance to win 1 of 7 'Manhattan Experience in Melbourne' for you and a friend!

Prize includes return flights to Melbourne from any major Australian city, 2 nights accommodation, welcome drinks with The Gospel crew, dinner voucher, tickets to a ‘Broadway’ show, tickets to a comedy show, The Gospel Manhattan Kit for you and your friend to take home, plus an itinerary to help you make the most of your 'Manhattan Experience' weekend. Total prize pool valued at over $16k!
settings.section_note:
^Terms & Conditions: This competition is run by The Gospel Whiskey ABN 98 635 493 444 ACN 635 493 444. Entry is open between 1 July 2023 12:00am AEST and 31 July 2023 11:59pm AEST. During this period, purchase a Manhattan cocktail using The Gospel Straight Rye Whiskey at a participating venue and upload a photo of the itemised receipt with venue name to https://www.thegospelwhiskey.com/pages/rye-july-competition
to be eligible to win. There will be 7 Major Prize Winners who will receive a ‘Manhattan Experience in Melbourne for you and 1 friend’ which includes 2x return economy flights to Melbourne from any major Australian city (flights not redeemable for Winner from Victoria), 2x nights accommodation in Melbourne CBD for 2 people, 2x transport costs from Melbourne Airport to Melbourne CBD accommodation, 1x ‘Manhattan Experience’ welcome drinks for 2 people with The Gospel Whiskey staff and other Major Prize Winners, 1x dinner for 2 people (valued up to $250), 2x tickets to a Melbourne ‘Broadway’ show, 2x tickets to a comedy show, 2x The Gospel Whiskey ‘Manhattan Kit’ to take home, 1x ‘Manhattan Experience in Melbourne’ itinerary. Total prize pool valued at $16,590. The prize is not transferable, not redeemable for cash, not for re-sale, and will be awarded to the confirmed winners only. Entrants must be 18+ years to enter and living in Australia, excluding NT. Winners must make their own way to a major city airport if they live in a regional town. The winner will be chosen at random on 7 August 2023 at 10:00am AEST at 38 Gawan Loop, Coburg North, Victoria, 3058. The winners will be announced on The Gospel Whiskey website (http://www.thegospelwhiskey.com) and contacted via email by 7 August 2023. The prize must be claimed before 14 August 2023, otherwise the prize will be withdrawn on 17 August 2023 at 10:00am. The prize must be redeemed on 6-8 October 2023 and dates are not transferrable. By filling out the entry form, entrants will receive email communications from The Gospel Whiskey. Subscribers have a right to unsubscribe from The Gospel Whiskey mailing list at any time by clicking the ‘unsubscribe’ link at the bottom of any email. The Gospel Whiskey reserve the right to make alterations to the Terms & Conditions of this giveaway if required. By filling out this form, entrants agree to these Terms & Conditions.
settings.section_content_closed:
Rye July is a month-long celebration shining a light on whiskey made from rye, the unsung hero of the whiskey world.

To celebrate, we are giving you the chance to win 1 of 7 'Manhattan Experience in Melbourne' prizes for you and a friend!

Prize includes return flights to Melbourne from any major Australian city, 2 nights accomodation, welcome drinks with The Gospel crew, dinner voucher, tickets to a 'Broadway' show, tickets to a comedy show, The Gospel Manhattan Kit for you and your friend to take home, plus an itinerary to help you make the most of your 'Manhattan Experience' weekend. Total prize pool valued at over $16k!

This competition will open on 1 July 2023, with further details on how to enter announced shortly.
settings.section_note_closed: Sign up to our newsletter or follow us on Instagram to keep up to date on upcoming news, limited releases and competitions.

settings.title: Competition Terms and Conditions

Entrants must be 18+ years to enter and living in Australia, excluding NT. Winners must make their own way to a major city airport if they live in a regional town. The winner will be chosen at random on 7 August 2023 at 10:00am AEST at 38 Gawan Loop, Coburg North, Victoria, 3058.
